dct_title_s: Migration Routes of the Five Largest Refugee Populations {1951-2015}
dct_description_sm: Migration routes for the five largest refugee populations in modern US history: Afghanistan, Ethiopia, Iraq, Somalia, and Syria.
Source data: “Population Statistics.” The UN Refugee Agency, http://popstats.unhcr.org/en/persons_of_concern. Accessed 7 June 2016.
